member.name: T:CMS.Newsletters.Web.UI.INewsletterReportDataProvider
member.summary: Provides methods to serve data for newsletter report.

member.name: M:CMS.Newsletters.Web.UI.INewsletterReportDataProvider.GetEmailsData(System.Int32)
member.summary:
Returns statistical data of email in the newsletter given by .
Single row of the resulting dataset contains the following data:
Email name
Data and time when the email was sent.
Total number of sent emails.
Number of emails opened by their recipients.
Number of links within the emails clicked by their recipients.
Number of recipients who opted-out from the feed.
Relative number of recipients who clicked any link in the email to total number of recipients.
Relative number of recipients who opened the email to total number of recipients.
Relative number of recipients who opted-out to total number of recipients.
member.param: ID of the email feed where the email belong.

member.name: T:CMS.Newsletters.Web.UI.NewsletterReportDataProvider
member.summary: Provides methods to serve data for newsletter report.

member.name: F:CMS.Newsletters.Web.UI.NewsletterReportDataProvider.issueVariantsByParentId
member.summary: Represents association between main issue (key) and all its variants (value).

member.name: F:CMS.Newsletters.Web.UI.NewsletterReportDataProvider.issueIDs
member.summary: Collection of all issue IDs related to the newsletter.

member.name: F:CMS.Newsletters.Web.UI.NewsletterReportDataProvider.onlyParentIssueIDs
member.summary: Collection IDs that represents main issues (ie. not variant issues).

member.name: F:CMS.Newsletters.Web.UI.NewsletterReportDataProvider.variantOpens
member.summary: Represents association between main issue ID and sum of 'opens' of its variants.

member.name: F:CMS.Newsletters.Web.UI.NewsletterReportDataProvider.siteName
member.summary: Name of site the newsletter belongs to.

member.summary: Checks whether has "authorissues" permission in Email marketing module for site to which given is assigned to.

member.name: M:CMS.Newsletters.Web.UI.CMSNewsletterSendPage.HandleBreadcrumbsScripts
member.summary: Handles manual rendering of breadcrumbs. The breadcrumbs on this page needs to be hard-coded in order to be able to access single email via link and ensure consistency of breadcrumbs.
